description.value:
Your origin becomes elemental. For the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin, you are considered to be an elemental. Add Primordial to the languages you can read, write, and speak. You gain a +1 power bonus to Athletics checks and Endurance checks. Whenever you use your second wind, this power bonus increases to +4 until the end of your next turn.
You also gain the inevitable strike power.
